text:
A look at leaked advice coming from a taskforce of Scott Morrison’s Covid-19 commission.  Gas all the way, with substantial taxpayer underwriting for fossil fuel development. Other fuels, options not mentioned.
Draft report is embedded. https://t.co/LNNIUTXnWF
